text: Ertuğrul da, Aliyar da birliği sağlamak maksadıyla…
english: Both Ertuğrul and Aliyar will be at the inn until evening, with the aim of ensuring unity.

text: Onların bu yokluğu obanın bütün kapılarını açacak bana.
english: Their absence will open all the doors of the tribe to me.

text: Aliyar’ı baş edinen onca Alp ne olacak?
english: What will become of all those Alps who took Aliyar as their leader?
They'll be hunted while they're out hunting, Vasilius. I will send
all of Aliyar's Alps hunting. There will be no

-And peace be upon you. -Wa alaikum assalam.

text: Türk beylerinden haber getirdim, Ertuğrul Bey.
english: I have brought news from the Turkish lords, Ertuğrul Bey.

text: Beylerimiz yarım kalan birlik toyumuzun tamam olmasını diler.
english: Our gentlemen wish for the completion of our unfinished union celebration .

text: Bundan sebep, yarın Hanlı Pazar’da toy isterler.
english: Therefore, they want a wedding at Hanlı Bazaar tomorrow.

text: Aliyar Bey’e de haber ulaştı. O da iştirak edecektir beyim.
english: Aliyar Bey also received the news. He will also participate, sir.

shrouded in dark clouds for quite some time.

shoot arrows and polish their weapons.

...make flowers bloom in a man's heart...
...and there are women who make poisonous plants grow. That's a
how do we understand it, where do we find it?

text: Hangi hatun sevgi verir, hangisi cefa verir?
english: Which woman gives love, and which brings suffering?

text: Hay kardeşim benim, hay kardeşim benim.
english: Oh my brother, oh my brother.
You will open your hands, my brother, you will open your hands... ...and
Ah, and you must keep your intentions pure.

text: Sonra bir de bakıvermişsin ki gökten nasibin düşüvermiş.
english: Then, before you know it, your share has fallen from the sky.

text: Ha, aha da böyle elma gibi önüne yuvarlanıvermiş.
english: Ah, there it is, rolling right in front of you like an apple .

text: Elma dersin, filiz dersin, sevgi dersin de Bamsı kardeş...
english: You talk about apples, you talk about sprouts, you talk about love, but brother Bamsi...
you come from your homeland hungry. Didn't your sister-

text: Bu sefer, bu sefer köteği hak ettin kardeş.
english: This time, this time you deserved a beating, brother.
(Bamsi) You deserved a beating this time.

text: Bu sefer köteği hak ettin. Gel buraya!
english: You deserved a beating this time. Come here!
(Artuk) In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

text: Halime Sultan'ın durumu iyi değildir beyim.
english: Halime Sultan is not well, my lord.
(Artuk) It's clear that labor has begun.

text: Lakin ters giden bir şeyler vardır.

english: I'll let you know right away.

text: Hafsa Hatun, sen de sıcak su hazırlayasın.
english: Hafsa Hatun, you prepare the hot water too. You'll
need it when the midwife arrives.
We will do everything in our power.

text: Lakin bebeğin ters gelme ihtimali vardır.
english: However, there is a possibility that the baby is in a breech position.

text: Beyim, bu adam sizinle görüşmek ister.
english: Sir, this man wishes to speak with you.
(Abdurrahman) says it's important. May it be for the best

text: Ertuğrul Bey, beni sultanın gözü gönderdi.
english: Ertuğrul Bey, the Sultan's eye, sent me.

(Hayme) In the name of Allah. Here you go. Let's see,
Hopefully, it will flow like a flood.

Hang in there, it won't be long now.
Our Sultan's eye has been revealed. He had to
What do you say? We were ambushed at the very spot where

text: Sultanımızın gözüyle buluştuğumuz yerde pusuya düştük.

english: He was injured. I had to hide

text: Ben de bulduğum mağaraya onu saklamak zorunda kaldım.
english: it in the cave I found . It is

text: Lakin sana iletmesi gereken mühim bir bilgi olduğunu söyledi.
english: But he said he had important information to share with you.

text: Sultanın gözü kör olmadan yetişsin dedi.
english: He said that the sultan should grow up before he becomes blind.
Tell me, who were you going to meet?

text: İmparatorumuzun sarayından aşırdığın bilgileri kime götürüyordun?
english: To whom were you taking the information you stole from our Emperor's palace?

text: Sen söylemesen de seni kurtarmaya geldiğinde...
english: Even if you don't tell me,
I'll find out anyway when I come to rescue you...

text: Allah'ın laneti her daim üstünde olsun Vasilius.
english: God's curse be upon you forever, Vasilius.
You too, and your emperor's as well.

text: Turgut, en iyi Alpleri hazır edesin.
english: Turgut, prepare the best Alps. We
have an important duty. Yes sir

text: Lakin Ertuğrul Bey, kör karanlıkta ne mağarayı bulabilirim ne de yolu.
english: But Ertuğrul Bey, in this pitch darkness, I can neither find the cave nor the way.
If we wait until morning, the sultan's eye will die.

text: Gündüzün şerri, gecenin hayrından evladır Ertuğrul Bey.
english: The evil of the day is better than the good of the night, Ertuğrul Bey.
Even if we went now, we wouldn't find it.

text: İshak'a söyleyin, hazır olsun. O da bizimle gelecek.
english: Tell Isaac to be ready. He will come with us too. We have
wounded. Yes sir, your wish is my command
. Yes sir, your wish is my command

text: Ebu Mansur, müsaadeniz olursa diyeceklerim vardır.
english: Abu Mansur, if you'll allow me, I have something to say.

text: Çakal, bugün sürüsüyle birlikte yuvasından çıktı.
english: The jackal left its den today with its pack. He then

text: O vakit bir av kokusu almıştır.

english: Which direction did they go? To
a place they call Nikos Hill.

text: Çakallar ava çıkarsa, aslanlar yerinde durmaz.
english: jackals go hunting, lions don't stay put.
Oh, oh! Ah! Ah! Ah! Ah! Ah!

text: Çocuğun öyle kolay gelmeye niyeti yoktur.
english: The child has no intention of coming easily.
The child is coming upside down.
-(Halime) Ah! -(Aslıhan) Ah, Halime Sultan. Just a
little more effort. Be patient. Keep up the good work!
My daughter, my darling. Keep up the good work!
Almost there. Keep trying, my child

english: Come on, Halime Hatun. Almost there, just hang in there.
(Hayme) Come on, my dear, come on, my dear, keep trying. Oh

My brother is coming, Dad, I'll wait for him. Are
you waiting for him too? Just
as we wait for the sun to rise...

text: Sen nasıl geldiysen o da gelecek inşallah.
english: as you came, he will come too, God willing.

text: Beni de mi öyle beklediniz baba?
english: Did you wait for me like that too, Dad?

text: Kardeşinin hemen gelmesini istersen gidip yatasın.
english: If you want your brother to come right away, go to bed.
If you fall asleep, your brother will come soon.
I'm going to see my mother.
Not now, son, not now. Come on then
, come on, come on. Come on

text: Dilersen biz gidip yiğidi kurtaralım Ertuğrul Bey.
english: If you wish, we can go and rescue the brave man, Ertuğrul Bey.

text: Biz devletin bekası için ant içtik Aliyar Bey.
english: We swore an oath for the survival of the state, Aliyar Bey.

text: Evladım bensiz de olsa doğacak ve hür yaşayacak.
english: My child will be born and live free, even without me.
Turgut, get the horses ready. Yes sir, your wish is my command

text: Rabbim seni de, evladımızı da yardımsız koymayacaktır.
english: God will not leave you or our child without help.
Son, please allow me. I'll be back,
I'll come back no matter what.
-(Halime) Oh, oh! -(Hayme) Come on, my dear, come on.
-(Halime) Ah. -(Hayme) Keep up the good work! Ah!

text: Halime Sultan'a iyi bakasınız Artuk Bey.
english: Take good care of Halime Sultan, Artuk Bey. Do
n't you worry at all, sir.
We will do everything we can.
(Hayme) Halime, it won't be long now.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im sizi görmek için hana gelecekti.
english: Ertuğrul Bey was going to come to the inn to see you . I

text: Ertuğrul Bey'i bekletmeyecek kadar saygım vardır Dumrul Alp.
english: have enough respect for Dumrul Alp not to keep Ertuğrul Bey waiting.

text: Geldiği vakit ben çoktan dönmüş olacağım.
english: By the time he arrives, I'll already be back.

text: Alplere haber et. Bu adamın nereye gittiğini öğreneceğiz.
english: Send word to the Alps. We'll find out where this man went.
-(Halime) Oh, oh! -(Hayme) Okay. Come on, my dear.

text: Derin derin nefes al Halime Sultan.
english: Take a deep breath, Halime Sultan.
(Midwife) You can take, you can give.
You can give and receive. Here you go,

... as long as I live... I will not cause
you or our child any sorrow or worry,

text: ...gam da, tasa da yaşatmam bilesin Halime Sultan.

english: (Halime's voiceover) May God never take you away from us .
-(Hayme) Oh my dear child, my dear child. -(Halime) Oh, oh! Ah!

text: Allah'ım, Allah'ım sen gelinimi, yavrumu bize bağışla.
english: God, oh God, please spare my daughter-in-law, my child, and keep her safe.
Come on brother, hang in there, be strong. Ah!

mom. Keep up the good work!
